children.string: Written by:: Jay Y. Kim, for [[Christianity Today]]

Excerpt:: Money stands right alongside political strife and racial tension as one of the most challenging and complex realities I address from the pulpit as a local church pastor. This is true for many if not most church leaders.

[Rooming houses are part of the housing solution. Toronto city council should legalize them](https://www.thestar.com/opinion/editorials/2021/09/30/rooming-houses-are-part-of-the-housing-solution-toronto-city-council-should-legalize-them.html) #[[affordable housing]] #[[toronto]] #[[urban planning]]
Written by:: Star Editorial Board, for [[Toronto Star]]
Excerpt:: Toronto’s city council has an opportunity at its meeting starting on Friday to take a modest step toward easing the crisis of affordability in housing. It should act.
